name: string-indices
summary: A basic extension to Swift Strings to allow string manipulation with Int values instead of String.Index values.
description:
A basic extension to Swift Strings to allow string manipulation with Int values instead of String.Index values.

Available methods:
String.substring(from: Int) -> String
String.substring(to: Int) -> String
String.substring(with: Range<Int>) -> String
String.range(of: String) -> Range<Int>
